ygData.msgSnippet: you can change what things look like. I edited a cleric once. I made it have a yellow ball on top of its staff Jeff

you can change what things look like. I edited a cleric once. I made it
have a yellow ball on top of its staff

Jeff

slwright@... wrote:
> 
> From: slwright@...
> 
> I put the levels website on hold until I actually get some levels.  I am currently working on a set of levels (about 12-15), and when I finish them I will create the website.  Again, if anyone has any levels, feel free to email them to me, and I will make sure they go up on the website for others to check out.
> 
> Also, I noticed there was a graphics editor included w/ the game.  Anyone ever tried creating new monsters?  Is it possible, or can you only modify existing creatures?
>
